text: (nabiye!) samānayan tabā namadinnangen kavurun hō oba veta ārakṣāva pætuvahot allāhgē āyāvan ohu savan dena turu ohuṭa ārakṣāva sapayanu. (ohu eya savan dī viśvāsaya notæbuvahot) ohuva, ohuṭa ārakṣāva sapayana (venat) sthānayakaṭa yavanu mænava! mandayat niyata vaśayenma ovun dænuma næti janatāvak vaśayen siṭinnēya
